title: Jimmy G Can Seek A Trade
description:
Field Yates and the NFL Live crew discuss the 49ers giving Jimmy Garappolo’s agents permission to seek a trade, what Jimmy G offers to a team, if this year is Jameis Winston’s last chance to prove himself and Ryan Clark’s opinions on Madden Safety Ratings.

itunes:subtitle: NFL Live: The 49ers give Jimmy G permission to seek a trade and is it Jameis' last chance?
